products.name: OnePlus 13 Snapdragon 8 Elite

products.name: URBN 10000 mAh Ultra Compact 22.5W Super Fast Charging Pocket Power Bank
products.description: The Power bank comes with speed up to 22.5 Watt for all Quick charge and Power Deliver compatible devices. Unlike regular power banks, charge your devices and the Urbn Power Bank, both at super-fast speed. Make sure the cable is 22.5 Watt compatible to ensure max speed.

products.name: HP 150 Wired Mouse
products.description: Elegant ergonomic design gives you all-day comfort so you can get it all done. It feels so natural, you'll forget you're holding it.
